name: Redemption After Life
description:
Note that the game is NOT FINNISHED.

The game was finished in a hurry.

It will eventually get updated to what it was supposed to be, in the meantime try it.

Controls:

Aim with mouse and shoot with Left Click.

Move with WASD

Once you pick up a Health Potion (Whose sprite is not there for whatever reason) Press E to heal.
